title: The Price Is Right - Jim Price From CLE Cigars Joins Us!
itunes:title: The Price Is Right - Jim Price From CLE Cigars Joins Us!
description:
Was he Rep X? Will he admit if he was? We talk to Jim Price from CLE Cigars on this weeks episode of The Cigar Authority. We will talk with him about life on the road and if this turned out to be everything he hoped it would be.. We will also talk to him about CLE, Eiroa and Asylum cigars the brands he represents.

In the first hour we will light up a cigar from their portfolio that also happens to be a part of The Cigar Authority Care Package. We will share our thoughts on Eiroa First 20 Years Colorado.

In the second hour Dave digs deep into his vault and pulls out some cigars for us to light up. We will look at these cigars and let you know our thoughts on them as Jim Price stays and we look back at the good old days of cigars.

Join us on The Cigar Authority, the most listened to cigar podcast in the world. We will have all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
